A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Please ignore the fake outrage and clearly orchestrated negative user reviews - as a huge Star Wars fan and movie lover\, I can say this is among the best Star Wars films ever made\, recapturing the goofy naïveté of the originals\, while offering an emotional depth mostly missing from the rest. A worthy echo of Empire; a phenomenal steward of the flame of Luke Skywalker and Leia Organa many years later; and creating iconic characters in Rey\, Kylo Ren and Po\, who can go on to become the centrepiece of the Star Wars universe for a new generation. What an achievement.
